title: Atlantis - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/8/22
itunes:title: Atlantis - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/8/22
description:
George Noory and author David Edward discuss his research into the true location of the lost city of Atlantis, his theories into what destroyed the civilization, and if there were any survivors that resettled around the world.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
